About
Contact, Information & Expirence

A graphic designer working as a creative partner across brand, publication, and digital design projects.

Using my design background as a vehicle to practise across desciplines, I've worked independently with a variety of teams, companies, and organizations for over 6 years on a range of creative projects spanning art, environment, culture, and technology.

In 2015 I co-founded Alder with a group of close collaborators to support this work. We're currently based in Burlington, Vermont. You can view my full CV here.
